languages.text: "Премного благодарен." {n}Дознаватель отстраняется, все еще не сводя с вас взгляда — притворная покладистость ваших слов явно его не обманула.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Премного благодарен." {n}Дознаватель отстраняется, все еще не сводя с вас взгляда — притворная покладистость ваших слов явно его не обманула.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Премного благодарен." {n}Дознаватель отстраняется, все еще не сводя с вас взгляда — притворная покладистость ваших слов явно его не обманула.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “非常感谢。”{n}海因里希后退一步，双眼依然紧盯着你。他并没有相信你突如其来的顺从。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “非常感谢。”{n}海因里希后退一步，双眼依然紧盯着你。他并没有相信你突如其来的顺从。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Un placer». {n}El interrogador da un paso atrás pero no te quita ojo. Tu rápida aceptación no le convence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un placer». {n}El interrogador da un paso atrás pero no te quita ojo. Tu rápida aceptación no le convence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「どうもありがとう」{n}インテロゲイターはあなたを見つめながら一歩下がる…彼は、あなたの安易な黙諾には乗せられてはいないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「どうもありがとう」{n}インテロゲイターはあなたを見つめながら一歩下がる…彼は、あなたの安易な黙諾には乗せられてはいないようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Et je vous en remercie. » {n}L'interrogateur fait un pas en arrière sans pour autant vous quitter du regard, visiblement rendu encore plus méfiant par votre changement subit d'attitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et je vous en remercie. » {n}L'interrogateur fait un pas en arrière sans pour autant vous quitter du regard, visiblement rendu encore plus méfiant par votre changement subit d'attitude.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Besten Dank." {n}Der Interrogator tritt einen Schritt zurück, behält dich dabei aber trotzdem noch im Auge – er ist nicht darauf hereingefallen, da du so schnell eingewilligt hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Besten Dank." {n}Der Interrogator tritt einen Schritt zurück, behält dich dabei aber trotzdem noch im Auge – er ist nicht darauf hereingefallen, da du so schnell eingewilligt hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}

languages.text: "Müteşekkirim." {n}Sorgucu, gözlerini senden ayırmadan geriye çekiliyor. Bu kadar kolay razı gelmeni inandırıcı bulmadığı aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Much obliged." {n}The Interrogator steps back, still keeping his eyes on you — he has not been taken in by your easy acquiescence.{/n}
